channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
ok i have a few problems.
its a 317
1. how do i make some kind of ge like u type ::sell (item id) (amount) and it comes on a scroll then if u type ::checkge that u see the scroll with all pending offers if soemone else types ::buy (item id) (amount) then it appears in his/her inventory i bet alot of servers want to have something like this
2. lets say: every 10 min the text : all vote @ webadress (not filling this in cuz some think its advertising) comes in every chatbox
3. if i type like ::npc (npc id) then an isnstant npc spawn is there (not paste a thing in autospawn)
ok thats it i think, please help me (if you are an expert java coder pm me plz, i can code well myself but not taht good)
EDIT: i knew i forgot something, can anyonee please help me with making a webclient (just PM me, and ill send u the client)
edit: good old times

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

When you have 100 errors it usually means that you‚Äôve added (or missed) a curly brace.

{ or }

Make sure that for every open brace {, you have a close brace }‚Ä¶ No more, no less.

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

whattehp406, don‚Äôt let these assholes deter you.
It is true that the only way for us to ‚Äúhelp‚Äù you with what you asked would be to actually write the code for you.

What you‚Äôre asking is similar to, ‚ÄúHow would I build my own table for my dining room?‚Äù. The answer (as you can probably guess) isn‚Äôt that simple - you build a table; but it can be different sizes, shapes, it can have different functionality, and it can be built in several different ways. It‚Äôs all up to the person making it. It‚Äôs your table.

The same concept applies to your question. You could make a grand exchange infinitely different ways, and you could implement each different way several different ways. Questions like this are hard to answer, and that‚Äôs why these guys are giving you a tough time. My answer to you would be to learn the ropes of Java so that you can use it as a tool to put your own ideas into working code.

If you‚Äôre not sure where to start, I highly recommend joining other people‚Äôs projects and working with programmers that are more skilled than yourself. They will teach you what they know (both directly and indirectly), and you will gain experience that cannot be gained elsewhere. Good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

Dastan_:

oh dude‚Ä¶ for that you would have to do some serious java.

Naw not really. I mean think about it logically.

Create an array for each player (max size 6);
Create command to show interface for player looping thought the array. (for loop)
Create command for selling items and add the item to the player array.
Create command using substring to split the command to find the item the player wants.
Use if statement to find correct item and display the price to the buyer.
Loop though everyones array to see if they‚Äôre selling it. (for loop)
Add / remove money.
Add / remove items at appropriate times.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

ok , lemme give you a head start.

then if u type ::checkge that u see the scroll with all pending offers

this is an example.

} if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("checkge") && (playerRights >= 0)) { String name = command.substring(5); sendQuest("@whi@ server name blah blah blah)", 8144); //Title sendQuest("when u donate u get these following benefits", 8145); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("", 8148); sendQuest("D Clawz 5$,Sara Sword 4$,Dragon Plate 4$", 8149); sendQuest("text", 8150); sendQuest("text", 8151); sendQuest("text", 8152); sendQuest("text", 8153); sendQuest("text", 8154); sendQuest("text", 8155); sendQuest("text", 8156); sendQuest("text", 8157); sendQuest("tex", 8158); sendQuest(" @whi@Owner YOUR NAME", 8160); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); sM("Donate to keep us alive or whatever you want to type in here"); }

now if you will get any erros or have any questions ask.
just dont ask how to write the code. ask more specific, that way you will learn.
sorry if i showed up too harsh earlier
